Display IMU data with LSM9DS1

dev board Arduino Nano 33 BLE Sense
firmware Arduino
chip LSM9DS1
sensor IMU

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Arduino MBed OS Nano Boards
  • Simple Accelerometer LSM9DS1

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Blinky with Arduino Nano 33 BLE sense

Buy the components

  1. Arduino Nano 33 BLE Sense

Code

Download code nano33-ble-sense-imu.ino

Makefile

Serial console

Serial output from the firmware.

Description

Display IMU data with Arduino board Nano 33 BLE Sense with IMU LSM9DS1.

Install the dependancy:

arduino-cli lib install Arduino_LSM9DS1

References

  1. Arduino Nano 33 BLE Sense
  2. Getting started with the Arduino NANO 33 BLE Sense
  3. Simple Accelerometer example with LSM9DS1
